mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BUSINESSTRIP ( BT_ID, AUTHOR_ID, AUTHOR_DEPT, TITLE, LOCATION, TRIP_START_DATE, TRIP_END_DATE, TRANSPORTATION_TYPE, TRIP_PURPOSE, FILENAME, APPROVAL_STATE, CREATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{BT_ID}, #{AUTHOR_ID}, #{AUTHOR_DEPT}, #{TITLE}, #{LOCATION}, #{TRIP_START_DATE}, #{TRIP_END_DATE}, #{TRANSPORTATION_TYPE}, #{TRIP_PURPOSE}, #{FILENAME}, 0, NOW())
INSERT INTO BUSINESSTRIP_ROLES ( BT_ID, USER_ID, USER_TYPE ) VALUES ( #{BT_ID}, #{USER_ID}, #{USER_TYPE} )

INSERT INTO BUSINESSTRIP_EXPENSES ( BT_ID, EXPENSE_ID, EXPENSE_TYPE, EXPENSE_DETAIL, PAYMENT_METHOD, PRICE ) VALUES ( #{BT_ID}, #{EXPENSE_ID}, #{EXPENSE_TYPE}, #{EXPENSE_DETAIL}, #{PAYMENT_METHOD}, #{PRICE} )

INSERT INTO COMPANY_EXPENSES ( EXPENSE_ID, EXPENSE_DATE, EXPENSE_DETAIL, EXPENSE_TYPE, PAYMENT_METHOD, PRICE ) VALUES ( #{EXPENSE_ID}, #{EXPENSE_DATE}, #{EXPENSE_DETAIL}, #{EXPENSE_TYPE}, #{PAYMENT_METHOD}, #{PRICE} )
INSERT INTO BUSINESSTRIP_FILES ( BT_ID, ORIGIN_FILE_NAME, FILENAME, UPLOADED_AT ) VALUES ( #{BT_ID}, #{ORIGIN_FILE_NAME}, #{FILENAME}, #{UPLOADED_AT})
mapper.update: UPDATE BUSINESSTRIP SET AUTHOR_ID=#{AUTHOR_ID}, AUTHOR_DEPT=#{AUTHOR_DEPT}, TITLE=#{TITLE}, LOCATION=#{LOCATION}, TRIP_START_DATE=#{TRIP_START_DATE}, TRIP_END_DATE=#{TRIP_END_DATE}, TRANSPORTATION_TYPE=#{TRANSPORTATION_TYPE}, TRIP_PURPOSE=#{TRIP_PURPOSE}, FILENAME=#{FILENAME} WHERE BT_ID=#{BT_ID}

UPDATE BUSINESSTRIP_EXPENSES SET EXPENSE_ID=#{EXPENSE_ID}, EXPENSE_TYPE=#{EXPENSE_TYPE}, EXPENSE_DETAIL=#{EXPENSE_DETAIL}, PAYMENT_METHOD=#{PAYMENT_METHOD}, PRICE=#{PRICE} WHERE BT_EXP_ID=#{BT_EXP_ID}

UPDATE COMPANY_EXPENSES SET EXPENSE_DATE=#{EXPENSE_DATE}, EXPENSE_DETAIL=#{EXPENSE_DETAIL}, EXPENSE_TYPE=#{EXPENSE_TYPE}, PAYMENT_METHOD=#{PAYMENT_METHOD}, PRICE=#{PRICE} WHERE EXPENSE_ID=#{EXPENSE_ID}
mapper.select: SELECT BT_ID, AUTHOR_ID, AUTHOR_DEPT, TITLE, LOCATION, TRIP_START_DATE, TRIP_END_DATE, TRANSPORTATION_TYPE, TRIP_PURPOSE, FILENAME, APPROVAL_STATE, CREATED_AT FROM BUSINESSTRIP WHERE BT_ID=#{BT_ID}

SELECT BT_ID, LOCATION, AUTHOR_ID, TRIP_START_DATE, TRIP_END_DATE, CONCAT(DATEDIFF(TRIP_END_DATE, TRIP_START_DATE)+1, "Ïùº") AS TRIP_PERIOD,
(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(EMP.EMP_Name SEPARATOR ', ') FROM BUSINESSTRIP_ROLES AS BTR JOIN EMPLOYEE AS EMP ON EMP.EMP_NO = BTR.USER_ID WHERE BTR.BT_ID = BT.BT_ID AND BTR.USER_TYPE = 0) AS TRAVELER_NAME
FROM BUSINESSTRIP AS BT WHERE 1=1
AND #{searchTripDate} BETWEEN TRIP_START_DATE AND TRIP_END_DATE
AND LOCATION LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword} ,'%')
HAVING TRAVELER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword} ,'%')
ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT BTR.BT_ID, BT_ROLE_ID, BTR.USER_ID, USER_TYPE, EMP.EMP_Name AS USER_NAME, EMP.EMP_Dept AS USER_DEPT_CODE, EMP.EMP_Position AS USER_POS_CODE,
(SELECT POS_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE AS EMP JOIN POS ON EMP.EMP_Position = POS_CODE WHERE EMP.EMP_NO = BTR.USER_ID) AS USER_POS_NAME,
(SELECT DEP_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE AS EMP JOIN DEP ON EMP.EMP_Dept = DEP_CODE WHERE EMP.EMP_NO = BTR.USER_ID) AS USER_DEPT_NAME
FROM BUSINESSTRIP_ROLES AS BTR JOIN EMPLOYEE AS EMP ON EMP.EMP_NO = BTR.USER_ID WHERE BTR.BT_ID=#{BT_ID}
SELECT BT_EXP_ID, EXPENSE_ID, BT_ID, EXPENSE_TYPE, EXPENSE_DETAIL, PAYMENT_METHOD, PRICE FROM BUSINESSTRIP_EXPENSES WHERE BT_ID=#{BT_ID}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM (SELECT BT.BT_ID, USER_ID, EMP_NAME, TRIP_START_DATE, TRIP_END_DATE, LOCATION FROM BUSINESSTRIP AS BT LEFT JOIN BUSINESSTRIP_ROLES AS BTR ON BT.BT_ID = BTR.BT_ID LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE AS EMP ON BTR.USER_ID = EMP.EMP_NO WHERE USER_TYPE=0) BT WHERE 1=1
AND #{searchTripDate} BETWEEN TRIP_START_DATE AND TRIP_END_DATE
AND LOCATION LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword} ,'%')
AND EMP_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword} ,'%')

SELECT EMP_NO AS EMP_SEQ, EMP_NAME, EMP_DEPT AS EMP_DEPT_CODE, EMP_POSITION AS EMP_POS_CODE, POS_NAME AS EMP_POS_NAME, DEP_NAME AS EMP_DEPT_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE AS EMP
JOIN DEP ON EMP_DEPT = DEP_CODE
JOIN POS ON EMP_POSITION = POS_CODE
WHERE 1=1
AND EMP_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND DEP_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND POS_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
ORDER BY EMP_NO DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(EMP_NO) totcnt FROM EMPLOYEE AS EMP JOIN DEP ON EMP_DEPT = DEP_CODE JOIN POS ON EMP_POSITION = POS_CODE WHERE 1=1
AND EMP_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND DEP_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND POS_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
